mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM todolist t JOIN todolist_detail d ON t.todo_id = d.todo_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(t.todo_date, '%y%m%d') = #{date}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM todolist t JOIN todolist_detail d ON t.todo_id = d.todo_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT(t.todo_date, '%y%m%d') = #{date} AND d.tododetail_state = 1

SELECT t.todo_date, COUNT(*) AS total_tasks, SUM(CASE WHEN d.tododetail_state = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS completed_tasks FROM todolist t JOIN todolist_detail d ON t.todo_id = d.todo_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId} AND t.todo_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY t.todo_date ORDER BY t.todo_date ASC

SELECT gm.user_id, ROUND(AVG(td.todo_progress), 2) AS progress FROM group_members gm JOIN todolist td ON gm.user_id = td.user_id WHERE gm.group_id = #{groupId} AND td.todo_date LIKE CONCAT(#{yyMM}, '%') GROUP BY gm.user_id ORDER BY progress DESC;

SELECT td.user_id, MAX(td.streak_days) AS streakDays FROM ( SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS streak_days FROM ( SELECT t.user_id, t.todo_date, DATEDIFF(t.todo_date, LAG(t.todo_date) OVER (PARTITION BY t.user_id ORDER BY t.todo_date)) = 1 AS is_streak FROM todolist t JOIN group_members gm ON t.user_id = gm.user_id WHERE gm.group_id = #{groupId} ) AS sub WHERE is_streak = 1 GROUP BY user_id ) AS td GROUP BY td.user_id ORDER BY streakDays DESC

SELECT t.user_id, COUNT(*) AS streakDays FROM ( SELECT t.user_id, t.todo_date, DATEDIFF(t.todo_date, LAG(t.todo_date) OVER (PARTITION BY t.user_id ORDER BY t.todo_date)) = 1 AS is_streak FROM todolist t JOIN group_members gm ON t.user_id = gm.user_id WHERE gm.group_id = #{groupId} ) AS t WHERE is_streak = 1 GROUP BY t.user_id ORDER BY streakDays DESC
